text: Consider the following 4-way set-associative cache: + Cache Organization (physically indexed and physically tagged) + Cache block size = 16 bytes + Total number of data blocks in the cache = 4K (each block is 16 bytes) + Cache write policy is write-back + Status bits: 16 per cache set [(1 Valid bit + 1 Dirty bit + 2 LRU bits) per line] * Memory address = 32 bits The total size of the cache including data and all the metadata is KB
